TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyGesture extends System.Windows.Input.InputGesture

summary.span: 定义可用来调用命令的组合键。

span.span: Defines a keyboard combination that can be used to invoke a command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大多数情况下， 必须与一个或多个关联 。In most cases, a must be associated with one or more . 此规则的例外情况是函数键和数字键盘键，它们本身可以是有效的 。The exceptions to this rule are the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, which can be a valid by themselves. 例如，你可以 只使用 F12 键来创建，但若要使用中的 X 键， 则必须与修改键配对。For example, you can create a by using only the F12 key, but to use the X key in a it must be paired with a modifier key. 通常，你可以In general, you can 您可以使用将 绑定 到 ，以便在发生时调用该命令 。You can use a to bind a to an , so that the command is invoked when the occurs. 对于 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 用法，通常在中设置的属性 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 是，这是因为 该笔势同时表示标准键和修改键。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usages, the property that is generally set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is , in cases where the gesture represents both a standard key and a modifier key. 你还可以将 属性设置为只是一个功能键，或者只是一个修改键组合。You can also set the property to be just a function key, or just a modifier key combination. 但是， 如果预期的命令绑定是没有修饰符的函数键，或者 如果预期的命令绑定仅用于修改键，则设置属性会更常见。However, it is more common to set the property if the intended command binding is a function key with no modifiers, or if the intended command binding is for modifier keys only. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `functionKey` 单个键值，必须是 (F1-12) 或数字键盘键之一的功能键。A single key value, which must be one of the function keys (F1-12) or numeric keypad keys. `oneOrMoreModifierKeys` 由枚举定义的一个或多个修改键 ，用 "+" 字符分隔。One or more modifier keys, defined by the enumeration, delimited with a "+" character. `key` 单个键值。A single key value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 使用将命令绑定到 。The following example shows how to bind the command to a using a . [!code-csharp[commandlibrarysnippets#KeyBindingWithKeyAndModifiers](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandLibrarySnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keybindingwithkeyandmodifiers)] [!code-vb[commandlibrarysnippets#KeyBindingWithKeyAndModifiers](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandLibrarySnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keybindingwithkeyandmodifiers)] 下面的示例演示如何 在中使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。The following example shows how to use in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 请注意， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 使用不会直接声明 `` 元素。Note that the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage does not directly declare a `` element. 由于不 公开公共无参数构造函数，因此不能使用该对象元素。That object element usage is not possible because does not expose a public parameterless constructor. 相反， [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 使用情况使用 typeconverter 行为将整个 内联声明为 `Gesture` 属性值。Instead, the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage uses the typeconverter behavior to declare an entire inline as the `Gesture` attribute value. [!code-xaml[commandWithHandler#CommandHandlerKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/commandWithHandler/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandhandlerkeybinding)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `targetElement` 可用于对是否应在特定元素上调用命令进行更具体的决策。`targetElement` can be used to make a more specific decision on whether a command should be invoked on a specific element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何测试是否 与与实例关联的输入匹配 。The following example shows how to test whether a matches the input associated with an instance of an . 使用方法创建了一个事件处理程序，该事件处理程序会将事件数据与进行比较 。A event handler is created that compares the event data with the by using the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大多数情况下， 必须与一个或多个关联 。In most cases, a must be associated with one or more . 此规则的例外情况是函数键和数字键盘键，它们本身可以是有效的 。The exceptions to this rule are the function keys and the numeric keypad keys, which can be a valid by themselves. 例如，你可以 只使用 F12 键来创建，但若要使用中的 X 键， 则必须与修改键配对。For example, you can create a by using only the F12 key, but to use the X key in a it must be paired with a modifier key.
